mapper.update: UPDATE ANYMERCY.COMMON_BOARD SET com_b_cnt = #{com_b_cnt}, com_photo = #{com_photo}, com_title = #{com_title}, WHERE COM_B_NO = #{com_b_no}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(DON_AMOUNT) AS don_total FROM donation WHERE DON_NOTI_NO = #{don_noti_no}

SELECT CAT_NO, DON_GOAL_AMT, DON_NOTI_CNT, DON_NOTI_DATE, DON_NOTI_NO, DON_NOTI_PHOTO1, DON_NOTI_TITLE, DON_NOTI_TYPE, GROUP_NO FROM ANYMERCY.DONATION_NOTI
WHERE DON_NOTI_NO = #{don_noti_no}

SELECT D.CAT_NO, D.DON_GOAL_AMT, D.DON_NOTI_CNT, D.DON_NOTI_DATE, D.DON_NOTI_NO, D.DON_NOTI_PHOTO1, D.DON_NOTI_TITLE, D.DON_NOTI_TYPE, D.GROUP_NO, C.CAT_NAME, C.CAT_PHOTO, C.CAT_AGE, C.CAT_LOCAL, C.CAT_CMT FROM ANYMERCY.DONATION_NOTI D, (SELECT CAT_NAME, CAT_NO, CAT_PHOTO, CAT_AGE, CAT_LOCAL, CAT_CMT FROM CAT) C WHERE D.DON_NOTI_NO = #{don_noti_no} AND D.CAT_NO = C.CAT_NO
